dcterms:creator: Andrew G Barto
dcterms:description: A single-time-step MDP that is similar to the k-bit multiplexer task, where the state is sampled from all possible values of a binary vector of size k + 2k with equal probability. The action set is {-1, 1}, and a reward of 1 is given if the action of the agent is the desired action and -1 otherwise.
dcterms:title: Multiplexer Task

dcterms:description: A scalar regression task where the dimension of input is 8 and follows the standard normal distribution. The target output is computed by a one-hidden-layer ANN with weights chosen randomly, aiming to predict the target output given the input.
dcterms:title: Scalar Regression Task

dcterms:creator: Richard S Sutton
Andrew G Barto
dcterms:description: A standard reinforcement learning task where an agent must balance a pole on a cart by applying forces to the left or right.
dcterms:title: CartPole

dcterms:creator: Richard S Sutton
Andrew G Barto
dcterms:description: A standard reinforcement learning task where an agent must control a two-link robotic arm to swing up and balance.
dcterms:title: Acrobot

dcterms:creator: Richard S Sutton
Andrew G Barto
dcterms:description: A standard reinforcement learning task where an agent must navigate a lander to a designated landing pad.
dcterms:title: LunarLander

dcterms:creator: Richard S Sutton
Andrew G Barto
dcterms:description: A standard reinforcement learning task where an agent must drive a car up a hill, requiring it to build momentum.
dcterms:title: MountainCar
